r.d: Selection of methods that are often needed when working with XML documents. Functionality includes creating of attribute lists from arrays, creation of tags, validation of XML names and more.
r.n: Changed license to New BSD License (Req #13826 [ashnazg]) Added a test suite against all API methods [ashnazg] Switch to package.xml v2 [ashnazg] Fixed Bug #4950: Incorrect CDATA serializing [ashnazg|ja.doma]
